meta.title: From DORIAN to GRAY
meta.author: Sandy Weisz
meta.message: We're honoring the Tony nominations this week. "The Picture of Dorian Gray" is an adaptation of Oscar Wilde's novel about a man who (spoiler) sells his soul for eternal youth. It stars Sarah Snook (from *Succession*) in a role that requires her to take on 26 different roles. Which is more roles than there are letters in "The Picture of Dorian Gray."

ladder.clue: Anagram ^ then add a D to get something that runs on some phones
Beloved ^ that looks like a trashcan
Change second word in ^ to get a franchise in the same genre
Remove the last three letters of ^ to begin
